SELECT A.EVENT_NO , A.CMPNY_ID , A.EVENT_SJ , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVENT_BEGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_BEGIN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVENT_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_END_DT , A.EVENT_CN , A.PRTNR_ID , A.EVENT_THUMBNAIL , A.EVENT_BANNER_IMG , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_MOB , A.EVENT_DETAIL_IMG , A.EVENT_URL , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_MOBILE , A.EVENT_CNT , A.END_AT , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , B.CMPNY_NM
ORDER BY A.EVENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.sql: FROM STN_GOODS_EVENT A LEFT JOIN STN_CMPNY B ON A.CMPNY_ID = B.CMPNY_ID
mapper.select: SELECT A.EVENT_NO , A.GOODS_ID , A.EVENT_RANGE_SE_CODE , B.GOODS_NM FROM STN_GOODS_EVENT_MAPNG A JOIN STN_GOODS B ON A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID WHERE A.EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}

SELECT A.EVENT_NO , A.CMPNY_ID , A.EVENT_SJ
, A.EVENT_BEGIN_DT , A.EVENT_END_DT , A.EVENT_CN , A.PRTNR_ID , A.EVENT_THUMBNAIL , A.EVENT_BANNER_IMG , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_MOB , A.EVENT_DETAIL_IMG , A.EVENT_URL , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_MOBILE , A.EVENT_CNT , A.END_AT , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , B.CMPNY_NM FROM STN_GOODS_EVENT A LEFT JOIN STN_CMPNY B ON A.CMPNY_ID = B.CMPNY_ID WHERE A.EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}

SELECT A.EVENT_NO , B.CMPNY_ID , A.EVENT_SJ , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVENT_BEGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_BEGIN_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVENT_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_END_DT , A.EVENT_CN , A.PRTNR_ID , A.EVENT_THUMBNAIL , A.EVENT_BANNER_IMG , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_MAIN_IMG_MOB , A.EVENT_DETAIL_IMG , A.EVENT_URL , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_PC , A.EVENT_BRAND_IMG_MOBILE , A.EVENT_CNT
, CASE WHEN A.EVENT_END_DT < SYSDATE() OR A.END_AT = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS END_AT , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , B.CMPNY_NM
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
ORDER BY DATEDIFF(A.EVENT_END_DT, SYSDATE()) ASC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
